title: Chocolate Chip Cookies with Extras
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '1 1/4 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground mace', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves', '225g butter, softened', '325g dark brown soft sugar', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '30g cornflakes cereal, crumbled', '250g porridge oats', '35g desiccated coconut', '325g plain chocolate chips', '120g chopped walnuts']
